org.lapps.datasource

Interface DataSource


  • public interface DataSource
    Represents a ranked list of documents with annotations. The implementation of this interface may store document id (and/or spans) itself and/or caching with DataSourceCachingStrategy.
    Author:
    Di Wang

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Document getDocument(ViewOptions options, java.lang.String documentID)
      Gets one document by documentID.
      DocumentStreamReader getDocumentStreamReader(ViewOptions options)
      Gets the document stream reader of current corpus.
      DataSource subCorpus(Query query)
      Gets a subset of corpus selected by input query.

    • Method Detail

      • subCorpus

        DataSource subCorpus(Query query)
        Gets a subset of corpus selected by input query.
        Parameters:
        query - the input query
        Returns:
        a subset of annotated corpus

      • getDocumentStreamReader

        DocumentStreamReader getDocumentStreamReader(ViewOptions options)
        Gets the document stream reader of current corpus.
        Parameters:
        options - the options that specify how to present each document such as returning "doc id", "doc content", "annotation", "annotation spans", etc.
        Returns:
        the document stream reader

      • getDocument

        Document getDocument(ViewOptions options,
                   java.lang.String documentID)
        Gets one document by documentID.
        Parameters:
        options - the options that specify how to present each document such as returning "doc id", "doc content", "annotation", "annotation spans", etc.
        documentID - the document id
        Returns:
        the document
